xfy.fakeview.library.fview

接口 IFViewGroup

  • 所有超级接口:
    FViewParent, IFView, IView
    所有已知实现类:
    FFrameLayout, FViewGroup

    public interface IFViewGroup
extends IFView, FViewParent
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/11/7.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 xfy.fakeview.library.fview.IFView

        IFView.OnClickListener, IFView.OnLongClickListener, IFView.Visibility

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 xfy.fakeview.library.fview.IFView

        ATTACHED_MASK, CLICKABLE, DISABLED, ENABLED, ENABLED_MASK, GONE, INVISIBLE, LAYOUT_MASK, LONG_CLICKABLE, MEASURED_HEIGHT_STATE_SHIFT, MEASURED_STATE_MASK, NO_ID, PRESS_MASK, VISIBILITY_MASK, VISIBLE

    • 方法详细资料

      • addView

        void addView(FView child)

        Adds a child view. If no layout parameters are already set on the child, the default parameters for this ViewGroup are set on the child.

        Note: do not invoke this method from IFView.draw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) or any related method.

        参数:
        child - the child view to add
        另请参阅:
        generateDefaultLayoutParams()

      • addView

        void addView(FView child,
             int index)
        Adds a child view. If no layout parameters are already set on the child, the default parameters for this ViewGroup are set on the child.

        Note: do not invoke this method from IFView.draw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) or any related method.

        参数:
        child - the child view to add
        index - the position at which to add the child
        另请参阅:
        generateDefaultLayoutParams()

      • addView

        void addView(FView child,
             IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams params)
        Adds a child view with the specified layout parameters.

        Note: do not invoke this method from IFView.draw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) or any related method.

        参数:
        child - the child view to add
        params - the layout parameters to set on the child

      • addView

        void addView(FView child,
             int index,
             IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams params)
        Adds a child view with the specified layout parameters.

        Note: do not invoke this method from IFView.draw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) or any related method.

        参数:
        child - the child view to add
        index - the position at which to add the child or -1 to add last
        params - the layout parameters to set on the child

      • getChildCount

        int getChildCount()
        Returns the number of children in the group.
        返回:
        a positive integer representing the number of children in the group

      • getChildAt

        FView getChildAt(int index)
        Returns the view at the specified position in the group.
        参数:
        index - the position at which to get the view from
        返回:
        the view at the specified position or null if the position does not exist within the group

      • generateDefaultLayoutParams

        IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams generateDefaultLayoutParams()
        Returns a set of default layout parameters. These parameters are requested when the View passed to addView(FView) has no layout parameters already set. If null is returned, an exception is thrown from addView.
        返回:
        a set of default layout parameters or null
